message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We can adjust it if you prefer, but I think this is a good starting point.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer. It's closer to even, and I believe it's a good starting point for negotiation.
I understand your desire for a fairer split, Bob. Let's try an even 50/50 split this time. It's a good compromise and we can both benefit from it.
